model.description: Model to use for image generation. Defaults to "dall-e-3".

quality.description: Quality of the image to generate. Can be "standard" or "hd". Defaults to "standard".

size.description: Size of the image to generate. Can be "1024x1024", "1792x1024", or "1024x1792". Defaults to 1024x1024.

description: Integrate DALL-E to generate images directly within your chatbot conversations.
name: dalle
title: DALL-E (Deprecated)
